title: Bed Hangings, late 17th–early 18th century
creditline: Gift of Peter H. Sharp, Caroline Sharp and Randall Sharp
description: Two sets of curtains and six valences (three for bed and three for tester.) The design is one of cartouches of genre scenes alternated with grotesques and strapwork in bright colors on an off-white background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bed Hangings, late 17th–early 18th century.
late 17th–early 18th century. Technique: embroidery, tent stitch. Gift of Peter H. Sharp, Caroline Sharp and Randall Sharp. 1993-88-1-a/l.
